details.title: Stability analysis of equilibrium manifolds for a two-predators one-prey model
details.abstract: The objective of this paper is to analyze the stability of equilibrium manifolds for a ratio-dependent two-predators one-prey model. Some model results are presented first with the bifurcation without parameters method, and then the method was used to study bifurcation along the equilibrium manifold for the model. The model does not lose stability even when some equilibria are locally unstable because the equilibrium manifold is stable when treated as a whole. The ecological implications of the results are discussed.
